textContent:
---y so cute---

I'm writing this the day after I changed my wallpaper photos to pictures of you. And my feelings of missing you keep getting worse Rei. Ang cute ng bungisngis mo potek grrr. I love you!!! 

My wallpaper of you right now is the face you make when I kiss you a lot and oh my god I'll never get tired of it. It's definitely one of the best expressions you make. I hope our future children will get it from you. Jasmine told me you scream girlhood and she's spot on. You're really cute, and innocent, and bubbly. You really are my very own Disney princess. I'll protect you from the world, Rei. Whatever it takes. I'll adore you and cherish you. Even if its just for the two of us, I'll make the a better place for you.

---maikling tula 4---

Tuwing kasama ka, ako'y napapangiti,
Ang ating mundo'y, nawawalan ng pighati,
Mga luha, na tutulo sa aking mga mata,
Ay dahil sayo, pagkat ako'y napasaya.


---maikling tula 5---

Aking sinta, daghang pasasalamat,
Pinaranas no, buhay na tila ba'y alamat,
Pangako ko, hinding hindi ka sasayangin,
Tiwala't pagmamahal mo, aking aarugain.
title: February 20, 2024
textContentHtml:
---y so cute---


I'm writing this the day after I changed my wallpaper photos to pictures of you. And my feelings of missing you keep getting worse Rei. Ang cute ng bungisngis mo potek grrr. I love you!!! 


My wallpaper of you right now is the face you make when I kiss you a lot and oh my god I'll never get tired of it. It's definitely one of the best expressions you make. I hope our future children will get it from you. Jasmine told me you scream girlhood and she's spot on. You're really cute, and innocent, and bubbly. You really are my very own Disney princess. I'll protect you from the world, Rei. Whatever it takes. I'll adore you and cherish you. Even if its just for the two of us, I'll make the a better place for you.


---maikling tula 4---


Tuwing kasama ka, ako'y napapangiti,

Ang ating mundo'y, nawawalan ng pighati,

Mga luha, na tutulo sa aking mga mata,

Ay dahil sayo, pagkat ako'y napasaya.



---maikling tula 5---


Aking sinta, daghang pasasalamat,

Pinaranas no, buhay na tila ba'y alamat,

Pangako ko, hinding hindi ka sasayangin,

Tiwala't pagmamahal mo, aking aarugain.
